text: The Great Warrior Skanderbeg () is a 1953 Soviet-Albanian drama movie directed by Sergei Yutkevich.Дети гор: чем заняться русскому туристу в АлбанииВеликий воин Албании Скандербег (1953) It stars Akaki Khorava, Besa Imami, and Adivie Alibali. The movie is a biography of George Kastriot Skanderbeg (1405–1468), widely known as Skanderbeg, a 15th-century Albanian lord who defended his land against the Ottoman Empire for more than two decades. ==Actors== * Akaki Khorava as Skanderbeg * Besa Imami as Donika Kastrioti * Adivie Alibali as Mamica * Semyon Sokolovsky as Hamza Kastrioti * Veriko Andjaparidze as Voisava Kastrioti == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian action movies Category:Russian biographical movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Albanian movies Category:1953 drama movies Category:1950s action movies Category:1950s biographical movies Category:1950s historical movies Category:Movies set in the 15th century Category:Movies directed by Sergei Yutkevich Category:Soviet action movies Category:Soviet biographical movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Great Warrior Skanderbeg
